hymn.title: Fade, fade each earthly joy
hymn.chords: | C - - - | F - Dm - | C/E - Am - | Dm7 - G7 - | C - C/E - | F - Dm - | C/G - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - - - | C - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - - - | C - Am - | Dm7 - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Fade, fade each earth -- ly joy; Je -- sus is mine. Break ev -- ery ten -- der tie; Je -- sus is mine. Dark is the wil -- der -- ness, Earth has no rest -- ing place, Je -- sus a -- lone can bless; Je -- sus is mine.
